content.text:
# Draft:ImageGrafix Software (IGFZCO)

Imagegrafix is a software company Established in 1996 in Dubai, UAE, offering services and products in the field of information technology services,
CAD, PLM, Project management and Internet of Things. It is the leading value-added-distributor, technical support center and service provider throughout the Middle East, Egypt and India. They have offices in Dubai, Saudi Arabia and nine different cities of India. They are reseller and distributors for companies like Autodesk, PTC and Oracle.
